who is carryminati

CarryMinati is a popular Indian YouTuber and streamer known for his gaming content and commentary. His real name is Ajey Nagar, and he was born on June 12, 1999. He is particularly famous for his roast and reaction videos, and has gained a massive following in India and globally.
